titleStmt.title: Two sermons vpon the XII. chapter of the Epistle to the Hebrewes, the sixteenth and seuenteenth verses Preached in the citie of London the twelfth day of Iune, 1608. By Thomas Hopkins minister at Yeardley in the countie of Worcester.
titleStmt.author: Hopkins, Thomas, minister at Yeardley.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted [by F. Kingston] for William Welby, dwelling in Pauls Churchyard at the signe of the Greyhound,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: Pauls Churchyard at the signe of the Greyhound
